refer_a_friend.prizeDistribution: Get your prize once your friend completes his missions !
refer_a_friend.generate_text: Generate your personal links and share them with your friends
refer_a_friend.loading_text: Your links are on the way
refer_a_friend.terms_and_conditions_text:
1. Eligibility: The Refer a Friend Bonus is available to all registered users of papigames who have made at least one deposit. 
2. Invitation Limit: Users can invite up to 10 friends to participate in the Refer a Friend Bonus. 
3. Bonus Amount: For every friend you refer, you will receive 250 PVP and 1,500 BRL in bonuses, while your friend will receive 500 PVP and 3,000 BRL in bonuses upon completing the 5 welcome missions. 
4. Bonus Allocation: For each mission your friend completes, you will receive 50% of their bonuses. 
5. Turnover Requirements: To receive the bonuses, your friend must meet the turnover requirements as specified in the referral program. 
6. Withdrawal: The bonuses received through the Refer a Friend Bonus are immediately withdrawable. 
7. Term: The Refer a Friend Bonus is available until further notice and may be withdrawn or changed by papigames at any time. 
8. Responsibility: You are responsible for ensuring that your friends are eligible to participate in the Refer a Friend Bonus and agree to these terms and conditions. 
9. Fraud: Any attempt to abuse or manipulate the Refer a Friend Bonus will result in the immediate termination of your account and the forfeiture of any bonuses. 
10. General Terms: The Refer a Friend Bonus is subject to the general terms and conditions of papigames, and these terms and conditions shall prevail in the event of any conflict with any other communications, including advertising or promotional materials.
refer_a_friend.how_it_works_text: How to get your referral rewards
